name: Cancer Simulator 2 | Return of the cancer
name_original: Cancer Simulator 2 | Return of the cancer
description:
After the events of cancer simulator, The host started chemotherapy, for a while everything seamed safe for the host, no cancer, just fun. That was when the cancer struck back at the host, injecting the host with more cancer than ever before.

NEW FEATURES

  • You can now pause and unpause the color-changing animation by using Q - pause and E - unpause
  • You can now type over 10x the original typing limit and new lines are introduced. 
  • There are now double the amount of colors for you to choose from.
